channel.title: Fire Cape has a glitch?
channel.description:
When i try to spawn a fire cape (item 6570) when i try to pick it up it always turns to a noted obby maul. what is going on here? where can i fix it?
ty =-)
EDIT: This only happens on my server (Start server) i havnt wrote my own. and im about to start java after i finish VisualBASIC.

item.title: Fire Cape has a glitch?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

master rune:

Would it not work if you did ::item?

Yes, that spawns the item. But in HybridScape, if you try to pick up an item over a certain ID number, it returns a different item. Remember: the ability to pick up items is not a standard thats built into servers. You can change it, and even remove it fully.

Read full topic

item.title: Fire Cape has a glitch?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

That’s one of the “features” of Hybridscape to keep it from crashing. When it was first made, the cache it was most often used with didn’t have those items in it. Thus it wouldn’t let you span any items over what the id of the obby maul is. If your just starting, you could probably figure what causes that like an excercise.

Read full topic
